channel.title: Desperate for help , I cannot use my IP
channel.description:
Hello. My name is Dillon and I have been playing moparscape servers for a few years now.
I have tried making servers 5 or 6...well about 3847938759345 times before but i has never worked. This time I am the furthest I have ever been.
I have been through ip-forwarding and also been through 12 servers in the past 4 hours and this I think , is it.
The problem is. I can only log onto my server when the IP is either blank or when it is 127.0.0.1.
And nobody else can log onto my server using the right ip (kittyscape.no-ip.biz).
could somebody pleasepleaseplease tell me what the problem is. Or try. I would appreciate it very very much. Thanks.
P.S. I have done everything a website has told me to do and I am 100% sure I have done everything , port worwarding , variables , editing source , ...everything...

item.title: Desperate for help , I cannot use my IP
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

127.0.0.1 is the running computer IP, also Localhost is the Running computer pc, for you only.
You need to portforward your ports, some routers do not allow that port or, the router can’t portforward. Sometimes it maybe the router has confusing setups of the ports. Or your router has too much traffic, or it’s a cheap Router.

Waves,
Kedonot1

Read full topic
item.source: Desperate for help , I cannot use my IP

Anythign else I am missing?
